resources.string: The code you scanned was invalid.
Are you sure you want to abort this transfer?
You do not seem to have a WiFi connection. A secure peer to peer connection can not be established over mobile data.
To receive contacts and other files, scan this code with the \"Scan Code\" feature on your other device:
Please wait for the server to initialize.
Point your camera to the code that is shown on the receiving device.
The transfer server could not be started. Please check your internet connection.
Error while trying to establish a connection. Are you connected to the same WiFi hotspot as the receiving device?\n\nYou can also try to enable the WiFi hotspot on your device.
The device you tried to connect to did return an invalid response.
Could not establish a secure encryption channel, please try again.
This version is not compatible with the version of the application on your other device. Please consider updating.
The other device requested a feature that is not available on your device.
The other device requires an encryption level that is only available in the Pro version of this application.
The other device sent an invalid connection password.
A client tried to connect, but was rejected: {0}
